title: This I Believe - NPR - chaptered itunes audiobook
description:
This is the 5 CD set of NPR\'s segment \"this i believe\".  It\'s a good listen and is the compilation of some of the best stories and the most famous contributors.  There\'s Einstein, Colon Powell, Eleanor Roosevelt, and some really funny and inspiring stories.  

It\'s 32kb bitrate which is how the cds came and it\'s 5 hours and 40 minutes long.

enjoy!


*UPDATE
if having problems with the tracker add this one:
http://tracker.openbittorrent.com:80/announce
